articles.author: Daniel Butler
articles.title: OneNote Web Extractor: When synthetic clicks fail
articles.description: Extract content from OneNote view-only links by using Playwright's native clicks to generate trusted events. Built through systematic debugging of why programmatic clicks stopped working.

articles.title: Sheetmask released!
articles.description: Sheetmask anonymizes your data and keeps relationships intact. It is great for PnLs and other financial data where the structure matters.
